schema:arrivalAirport.rdfs:comment: The airport where the flight terminates.
schema:arrivalAirport.rdfs:label: arrivalAirport

schema:arrivalGate.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the flight's arrival gate.
schema:arrivalGate.rdfs:label: arrivalGate

schema:arrivalTerminal.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the flight's arrival terminal.
schema:arrivalTerminal.rdfs:label: arrivalTerminal

schema:boardingPolicy.rdfs:comment: The type of boarding policy used by the airline (e.g. zone-based or group-based).
schema:boardingPolicy.rdfs:label: boardingPolicy

schema:carrier.rdfs:comment: 'carrier' is an out-dated term indicating the 'provider' for parcel delivery and flights.
schema:carrier.rdfs:label: carrier

schema:departureAirport.rdfs:comment: The airport where the flight originates.
schema:departureAirport.rdfs:label: departureAirport

schema:departureGate.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the flight's departure gate.
schema:departureGate.rdfs:label: departureGate

schema:departureTerminal.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the flight's departure terminal.
schema:departureTerminal.rdfs:label: departureTerminal

schema:estimatedFlightDuration.rdfs:comment: The estimated time the flight will take.
schema:estimatedFlightDuration.rdfs:label: estimatedFlightDuration

schema:flightNumber.rdfs:comment: The unique identifier for a flight including the airline IATA code. For example, if describing United flight 110, where the IATA code for United is 'UA', the flightNumber is 'UA110'.
schema:flightNumber.rdfs:label: flightNumber

schema:mealService.rdfs:comment: Description of the meals that will be provided or available for purchase.
schema:mealService.rdfs:label: mealService

schema:seller.rdfs:comment: An entity which offers (sells / leases / lends / loans) the services / goods.  A seller may also be a provider.
schema:seller.rdfs:label: seller

schema:webCheckinTime.rdfs:comment: The time when a passenger can check into the flight online.
schema:webCheckinTime.rdfs:label: webCheckinTime
